Farida Bourquia (amụrụ n'afọ 1948) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Moroccan, "otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị Morocco mbụ mere ihe nkiri na-arụ ọrụ ma na ihuenyo ma na telivishọn".
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị gbasara ihe nkiri na Moscow site na 1968 ruo 1973, Bourquia kụziri ihe nkiri na Conservatory nke Casablanca
Maka ọtụtụ ọrụ ya, ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi ọha na eze, Radiodiffusion-Télévision Marocaine, na-eme ihe ngosi na mmemme ụmụaka.
Maka International Women's Year na 1975, Bourquia mere ọtụtụ ihe ngosi banyere ụmụ nwanyị Morocco - ihe ngosi Morocco mbụ nke nwanyị mepụtara ma duzie
Ihe nkiri ya nke afọ 1982 bụ The Embers kọrọ akụkọ banyere ụmụaka atọ na-enweghị nne na nna n'obodo. Two Women on the Road (2007) bụ "ụdị Moroccan nke ihe nkiri ụmụ nwanyị America, Thelma na Louise".
